title: ShumiToken
author: ShumiToken
content: SHUMI is a digital meme token designed for easy storage and fundraising.The idea of the token is full decentralization, 100% community management and a fair distribution of profits among all token holders.Already at the stage of creation, we received the attention and support of thousands of people who share our views.SHUMI is set to become one of the fastest growing and most popular cryptocurrencies in the world.TokenomicsSHUMI has a limited supply of 21 billion coins.Our goal was to make SHUMI profitable, so the SHUMI smart contract has a number of unique features.Firstly, it is a function of distributing part of the funds from each purchase or sale of SHUMI on the exchange between the wallets of all token holders.Secondly, it is a function of burning a part of the tokens in the liquidity pool with each purchase or sale of SHUMI on the exchange, which reduces the total amount of issued tokens and increases their value in the holders' wallets.SHUMI Token is based on BSC.Distribution of commission fees:Buy/Sell1/2% - reward to holders1/2% - liquidity support1/2% - token burning2/4% - marketingüêØ Contract adress: 0x1cABcd4B66d86D703866050f6430eA86b66188BB (PancakeSwap)üåê Website: shumicoin.comüê¶ Twitter: https://twitter.com/shumibscüì© Telegram: https://t.me/shumi_official
